title: John McCain's Pollster Recounts 2000 New Hampshire Win, And It's Amazing
text: WASHINGTON -- In retrospect, Sen. John McCain (R-Ariz.) seems like the perfect Republican candidate for the New Hampshire presidential primary. He's a free-spirited pol who loves the give-and-take of town halls -- the very attributes that
